import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}

); } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText: PropTypes.string }; Navbar.defaultProps = { title:"Add title", aboutText:'About' };
